<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!DisableRedZone &amp;&amp; CanUseRedZone &amp;&amp; FitsInRedZone) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get the maximum call frame size of all the calls.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> maxCallFrameSize = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a4f335273c28b17552a7cfd802f42be2a">getMaxCallFrameSize</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Maximum call frame needs to be at least big enough for linkage area.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> minCallFrameSize = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcframelowering/#a50ec4d7eb2c3cc1d2d6cac266d4ea3eb">getLinkageSize</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">  maxCallFrameSize = std::max(maxCallFrameSize, minCallFrameSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we have dynamic alloca then maxCallFrameSize needs to be aligned so</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that allocations will be aligned.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a0509430713d587eba74220a8375948a8">hasVarSizedObjects</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">    maxCallFrameSize = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(maxCallFrameSize, Alignment);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Update the new max call frame size if the caller passes in a valid pointer.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NewMaxCallFrameSize)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#42;NewMaxCallFrameSize = maxCallFrameSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Include call frame size in total.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal">  FrameSize += maxCallFrameSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a> : MF)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.end(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a> != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.begin();) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><Highlight kind="normal">      --<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>-&gt;operands()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!MO.isReg())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">switch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MO.getReg()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PPC::FP:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><Highlight kind="normal">          MO.setReg(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvframelowering-cpp/#a1dd46e82704007e1b3b83ee229ffa79f">FPReg</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PPC::FP8:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><Highlight kind="normal">          MO.setReg(FP8Reg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PPC::BP:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><Highlight kind="normal">          MO.setReg(BPReg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PPC::BP8:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><Highlight kind="normal">          MO.setReg(BP8Reg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;  This function will do the following:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><Highlight kind="comment">    - If MBB is an entry or exit block, set SR1 and SR2 to R0 and R12</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><Highlight kind="comment">      respectively (defaults recommended by the ABI) and return true</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><Highlight kind="comment">    - If MBB is not an entry block, initialize the register scavenger and look</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><Highlight kind="comment">      for available registers.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><Highlight kind="comment">    - If the defaults (R0/R12) are available, return true</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><Highlight kind="comment">    - If TwoUniqueRegsRequired is set to true, it looks for two unique</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><Highlight kind="comment">      registers. Otherwise, look for a single available register.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><Highlight kind="comment">      - If the required registers are found, set SR1 and SR2 and return true.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><Highlight kind="comment">      - If the required registers are not found, set SR2 or both SR1 and SR2 to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><Highlight kind="comment">        PPC::NoRegister and return false.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><Highlight kind="comment">    Note that if both SR1 and SR2 are valid parameters and TwoUniqueRegsRequired</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="comment">    is not set, this function will attempt to find two different registers, but</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><Highlight kind="comment">    still return true if only one register is available (and set SR1 == SR2).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><Highlight kind="comment">&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><Highlight kind="normal">PPCFrameLowering::findScratchRegister(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><Highlight kind="normal">                                      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UseAtEnd,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="normal">                                      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TwoUniqueRegsRequired,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="normal">                                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &#42;SR1,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="normal">                                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &#42;SR2)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regscavenger">RegScavenger</a> RS;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> R0 =  Subtarget.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcsubtarget/#a6622b99b3c00a3938d969957312b1b52">isPPC64</a>() ? PPC::X0 : PPC::R0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> R12 = Subtarget.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcsubtarget/#a6622b99b3c00a3938d969957312b1b52">isPPC64</a>() ? PPC::X12 : PPC::R12;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Set the defaults for the two scratch registers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SR1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#42;SR1 = R0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SR2) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a> (SR1 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Asking for the second scratch register but not the first?&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#42;SR2 = R12;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If MBB is an entry or exit block, use R0 and R12 as the scratch registers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((UseAtEnd &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;isReturnBlock()) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><Highlight kind="normal">      (!UseAtEnd &amp;&amp; (&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;getParent()-&gt;front() == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (UseAtEnd) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The scratch register will be used before the first terminator (or at the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// end of the block if there are no terminators).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The scratch register will be used at the start of the block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><Highlight kind="normal">    RS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regscavenger/#a4f1af6e587ae8846628561570b54e2ee">enterBasicBlock</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the two registers are available, we&#39;re all good.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note that we only return here if both R0 and R12 are available because</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// although the function may not require two unique registers, it may benefit</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// from having two so we should try to provide them.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!RS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regscavenger/#a27037167fddcdde3b6207d025267bbfc">isRegUsed</a>(R0) &amp;&amp; !RS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regscavenger/#a27037167fddcdde3b6207d025267bbfc">isRegUsed</a>(R12))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get the list of callee-saved registers for the target.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get all the available registers in the block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><Highlight kind="normal">  BitVector BV = RS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regscavenger/#afaf92711851d9d2abd2ef7f6c1b68bf8">getRegsAvailable</a>(Subtarget.isPPC64() ? &amp;PPC::G8RCRegClass :</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><Highlight kind="normal">                                     &amp;PPC::GPRCRegClass);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We shouldn&#39;t use callee-saved registers as scratch registers as they may be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// available when looking for a candidate block for shrink wrapping but not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// available when the actual prologue/epilogue is being emitted because they</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// were added as live-in to the prologue block by PrologueEpilogueInserter.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; CSRegs&#91;i&#93;; ++i)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="normal">    BV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a168122d6ac4ed2a8b722e01b592ad289">reset</a>(CSRegs&#91;i&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Set the first scratch register to the first available one.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SR1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FirstScratchReg = BV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a2da3bac3ad70ccb97150626385ebd6a7">find&#95;first</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#42;SR1 = FirstScratchReg == -1 ? (unsigned)PPC::NoRegister : FirstScratchReg;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there is another one available, set the second scratch register to that.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise, set it to either PPC::NoRegister if this function requires two</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// or to whatever SR1 is set to if this function doesn&#39;t require two.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SR2) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SecondScratchReg != -1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#42;SR2 = SecondScratchReg;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// whether we were unable to provide enough.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a568ff706b8c5991bd299c8c00b803897">count</a>() &lt; (TwoUniqueRegsRequired ? 2U : 1U))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We need a scratch register for spilling LR and for spilling CR. By default,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we use two scratch registers to hide latency. However, if only one scratch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// register is available, we can adjust for that by not overlapping the spill</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// code. However, if we need to realign the stack (i.e. have a base pointer)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and the stack frame is large, we need two scratch registers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Also, stack probe requires two scratch registers, one for old sp, one for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// large frame and large probe size.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check the frame size first and return false if it does not fit the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// requirements.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We need a non-zero frame size as well as a frame that will fit in the red</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// zone. This is because by moving the stack pointer update we are now storing</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to the red zone until the stack pointer is updated. If we get an interrupt</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// inside the prologue but before the stack update we now have a number of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// stores to the red zone and those stores must all fit.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo">MachineFrameInfo</a> &amp;MFI = MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a54f334a9c8ca6d105eae383ae87e4524">getFrameInfo</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FrameSize = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a14c39a24bf6ebbe339ae8a453c7fdd11">getStackSize</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!FrameSize || FrameSize &gt; Subtarget.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcsubtarget/#a8e3633b3242b24aefa8db459348c92f0">getRedZoneSize</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Frame pointers and base pointers complicate matters so don&#39;t do anything</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// if we have them. For example having a frame pointer will sometimes require</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a copy of r1 into r31 and that makes keeping track of updates to r1 more</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// difficult. Similar situation exists with setjmp.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetframelowering/#a0c361440fb8d1e36932e65c8cc8497e7">hasFP</a>(MF) || <a href="/docs/api/structs/reginfo">RegInfo</a>-&gt;hasBasePointer(MF) || MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a4b94e0ca517e149914aa0c34ee06c9fa">exposesReturnsTwice</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Calls to fast&#95;cc functions use different rules for passing parameters on</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the stack from the ABI and using PIC base in the function imposes</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// similar restrictions to using the base pointer. It is not generally safe</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to move the stack pointer update in these situations.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (FI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcfunctioninfo/#a6207e730a0051bddd35b25e05407681a">hasFastCall</a>() || FI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcfunctioninfo/#a488e8422444868d47101cb1b7c3fd51d">usesPICBase</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Finally we can move the stack update if we do not require register</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// scavenging. Register scavenging can introduce more spills and so</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// may make the frame size larger than we have computed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> !<a href="/docs/api/structs/reginfo">RegInfo</a>-&gt;requiresFrameIndexScavenging(MF);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcframelowering/#aa670bf850cd6767f78408604873036f7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcframelowering/#aa670bf850cd6767f78408604873036f7">PPCFrameLowering::emitPrologue</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// indexed into with a simple STDU/STWU/STD/STW immediate offset operand.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> isLargeFrame = !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a1e51a5952c3afa00875df90e7ae6f8">isInt&lt;16&gt;</a>(NegFrameSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if we can move the stack update instruction (stdu) down the prologue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// past the callee saves. Hopefully this will avoid the situation where the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// saves are waiting for the update on the store with update to complete.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> StackUpdateLoc = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MovingStackUpdateDown = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if we can move the stack update.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (stackUpdateCanBeMoved(MF)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::vector&lt;CalleeSavedInfo&gt; &amp;Info = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#aad474502cac7b22b83e74de089f8c81d">getCalleeSavedInfo</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/calleesavedinfo">CalleeSavedInfo</a> CSI : Info) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the callee saved register is spilled to a register instead of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// stack then the spill no longer uses the stack pointer.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This can lead to two consequences:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1) We no longer need to update the stack because the function does not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    spill any callee saved registers to stack.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2) We have a situation where we still have to update the stack pointer</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    even though some registers are spilled to other registers. In</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    this case the current code moves the stack update to an incorrect</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    position.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In either case we should abort moving the stack update operation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CSI.isSpilledToReg()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><Highlight kind="normal">        StackUpdateLoc = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><Highlight kind="normal">        MovingStackUpdateDown = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FrIdx = CSI.getFrameIdx();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the frame index is not negative the callee saved info belongs to a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// stack object that is not a fixed stack object. We ignore non-fixed</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// stack objects because we won&#39;t move the stack update pointer past them.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (FrIdx &gt;= 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#ae6e7e975f7a4e5d535be32068a7c67df">isFixedObjectIndex</a>(FrIdx) &amp;&amp; MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#adf98860d7f42290f873c82a981eb0ea6">getObjectOffset</a>(FrIdx) &lt; 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><Highlight kind="normal">        StackUpdateLoc++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><Highlight kind="normal">        MovingStackUpdateDown = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We need all of the Frame Indices to meet these conditions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If they do not, abort the whole operation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><Highlight kind="normal">        StackUpdateLoc = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><Highlight kind="normal">        MovingStackUpdateDown = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the operation was not aborted then update the object offset.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MovingStackUpdateDown) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/calleesavedinfo">CalleeSavedInfo</a> CSI : Info) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FrIdx = CSI.getFrameIdx();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (FrIdx &lt; 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><Highlight kind="normal">          MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a3cd29e7edbcaceb5834eaa7d089a5bc4">setObjectOffset</a>(FrIdx, MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#adf98860d7f42290f873c82a981eb0ea6">getObjectOffset</a>(FrIdx) + NegFrameSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Where in the prologue we move the CR fields depends on how many scratch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// registers we have, and if we need to save the link register or not. This</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// lambda is to avoid duplicating the logic in 2 places.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BuildMoveFromCR = &#91;&amp;&#93;() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (isELFv2ABI &amp;&amp; MustSaveCRs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() == 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In the ELFv2 ABI, we are not required to save all CR fields.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If only one CR field is clobbered, it is more efficient to use</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// mfocrf to selectively save just that field, because mfocrf has short</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// latency compares to mfcr.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="#a69189b7d95c4b78145d9dc25a3de148b">MustSaveLR</a> &amp;&amp; !HasFastMFLR)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><Highlight kind="normal">      SaveLR(LROffset);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Adjust stack pointer: r1 += NegFrameSize.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there is a preferred stack alignment, align R1 now</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (HasBP &amp;&amp; HasRedZone) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Save a copy of r1 as the base pointer.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Have we generated a STUX instruction to claim stack frame? If so,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the negated frame size will be placed in ScratchReg.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HasSTUX =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><Highlight kind="normal">      (TLI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppctargetlowering/#a20e0ba2c46bef474e31cf8c2f9322db0">hasInlineStackProbe</a>(MF) &amp;&amp; FrameSize &gt; TLI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppctargetlowering/#ac4e23bdb97cbb1eebd9ddd6606a1006f">getStackProbeSize</a>(MF)) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><Highlight kind="normal">      (HasBP &amp;&amp; MaxAlign &gt; 1) || isLargeFrame;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we use STUX to update the stack pointer, we need the two scratch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// registers TempReg and ScratchReg, we have to save LR here which is stored</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in ScratchReg.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the offset can not be encoded into the store instruction, we also have</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to save LR here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we are using ROP Protection we need to save the LR here as we cannot</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// move the hashst instruction past the point where we get the stack frame.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="#a69189b7d95c4b78145d9dc25a3de148b">MustSaveLR</a> &amp;&amp; !HasFastMFLR &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><Highlight kind="normal">      (HasSTUX || !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a1e51a5952c3afa00875df90e7ae6f8">isInt&lt;16&gt;</a>(FrameSize + LROffset) || HasROPProtect))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><Highlight kind="normal">    SaveLR(LROffset);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If FrameSize &lt;= TLI.getStackProbeSize(MF), as POWER ABI requires backchain</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="994"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The negated frame size is in ScratchReg, and the SPReg has been</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="995"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// decremented by the frame size: SPReg = old SPReg + ScratchReg.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="996"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Since FPOffset, PBPOffset, etc. are relative to the beginning of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="997"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the stack frame (i.e. the old SP), ideally, we would put the old</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="998"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SP into a register and use it as the base for the stores. The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="999"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// problem is that the only available register may be ScratchReg,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1000"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// which could be R0, and R0 cannot be used as a base address.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1001"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1324"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Used to probe stack when realignment is required.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1325"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note that, according to ABI&#39;s requirement, &#42;sp must always equals the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1326"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// value of back-chain pointer, only st(w|d)u(x) can be used to update sp.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1327"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Following is pseudo code:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1328"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// final&#95;sp = (sp &amp; align) + negframesize;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1329"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// neg&#95;gap = final&#95;sp - sp;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1330"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// while (neg&#95;gap &lt; negprobesize) &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1331"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   stdu fp, negprobesize(sp);</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1332"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   neg&#95;gap -= negprobesize;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1333"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1334"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// stdux fp, sp, neg&#95;gap</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1335"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1336"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When HasBP &amp; HasRedzone, back-chain pointer is already saved in BPReg</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1337"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// before probe code, we don&#39;t need to save it, so we get one additional reg</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1338"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that can be used to materialize the probeside if needed to use xform.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1339"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise, we can NOT materialize probeside, so we can only use Dform for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1340"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// now.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1341"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1342"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The allocations are:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1343"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// if (HasBP &amp;&amp; HasRedzone) &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1344"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   r0: materialize the probesize if needed so that we can use xform.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1345"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   r12: &#96;neg&#95;gap&#96;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1346"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#125; else &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1347"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   r0: back-chain pointer</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1348"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   r12: &#96;neg&#95;gap&#96;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1349"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1350"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> probeRealignedStack = &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1635"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RetOpcode = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>-&gt;getOpcode();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1636"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UsesTCRet =  RetOpcode == PPC::TCRETURNri ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1637"><Highlight kind="normal">                      RetOpcode == PPC::TCRETURNdi ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1638"><Highlight kind="normal">                      RetOpcode == PPC::TCRETURNai ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1639"><Highlight kind="normal">                      RetOpcode == PPC::TCRETURNri8 ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1640"><Highlight kind="normal">                      RetOpcode == PPC::TCRETURNdi8 ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1641"><Highlight kind="normal">                      RetOpcode == PPC::TCRETURNai8;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1642"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1643"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (UsesTCRet) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1644"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxTCRetDelta = FI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcfunctioninfo/#a08f2debfe0bdcad74420a98b94d9e73b">getTailCallSPDelta</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1645"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;StackAdjust = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>-&gt;getOperand(1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1646"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(StackAdjust.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a76f61c6784df6dc8402a8b9011041926">isImm</a>() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expecting immediate value.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1647"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Adjust stack pointer.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1648"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StackAdj = StackAdjust.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a38b28a85f818b49d8806c150b8a5b4f7">getImm</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1649"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Delta = StackAdj - MaxTCRetDelta;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1650"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((Delta &gt;= 0) &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Delta must be positive&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1651"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MaxTCRetDelta&gt;0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1652"><Highlight kind="normal">        FrameSize += (StackAdj +Delta);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1653"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1654"><Highlight kind="normal">        FrameSize += StackAdj;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1655"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1656"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1657"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1658"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Frames of 32KB &amp; larger require special handling because they cannot be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1659"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// indexed into with a simple LD/LWZ immediate offset operand.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1660"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> isLargeFrame = !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a1e51a5952c3afa00875df90e7ae6f8">isInt&lt;16&gt;</a>(FrameSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1661"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1662"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// On targets without red zone, the SP needs to be restored last, so that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1663"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// all live contents of the stack frame are upwards of the SP. This means</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1664"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that we cannot restore SP just now, since there may be more registers</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1665"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to restore from the stack frame (e.g. R31). If the frame size is not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1666"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a simple immediate value, we will need a spare register to hold the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1667"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// restored SP. If the frame size is known and small, we can simply adjust</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1668"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the offsets of the registers to be restored, and still use SP to restore</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1669"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// them. In such case, the final update of SP will be to add the frame</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1670"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// size to it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1671"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To simplify the code, set RBReg to the base register used to restore</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1672"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// values from the stack, and set SPAdd to the value that needs to be added</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1673"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to the SP at the end. The default values are as if red zone was present.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1674"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RBReg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvframelowering-cpp/#a0e92b710da2e75e063fee5f7efb8f21e">SPReg</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1675"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t SPAdd = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1676"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1677"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if we can move the stack update instruction up the epilogue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1678"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// past the callee saves. This will allow the move to LR instruction</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1679"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to be executed before the restores of the callee saves which means</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1680"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that the callee saves can hide the latency from the MTLR instrcution.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1681"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> StackUpdateLoc = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1682"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (stackUpdateCanBeMoved(MF)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1683"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::vector&lt;CalleeSavedInfo&gt; &amp; Info = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#aad474502cac7b22b83e74de089f8c81d">getCalleeSavedInfo</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1685"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the callee saved register is spilled to another register abort the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1686"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// stack update movement.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1692"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the frame index is not negative the callee saved info belongs to a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2226"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2227"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2228"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2229"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Move general register save area spill slots down, taking into account</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2230"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the size of the Floating-point register save area.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2231"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0, e = G8Regs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>(); i != e; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2232"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!G8Regs&#91;i&#93;.isSpilledToReg()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
